column6:
"Hey! What's up with Cyke getting a whole issue to himself? Where's the Angel love?",2008,5
"Oh uh, yeah, Warren. We were just getting to you. A whole book, all you."
"Really?"
"Yeah, number 12. Oh, can we borrow a thousand bucks?"
"It's on my dresser! Woo-hoo, the ALL ANGEL issue!" Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | artist:Roger Cruz | penciller (cover):Carlo Pagualyan | writer:Jeff Parker | letterer:Nate Piekos | colorist:Val Staples
